pullrequest.title: Fixing issue in which publishing of messages gets stuck.

content.raw: Since this may or may not process any messages depending on whether pubIds remain, I wonder whether it would be safe to cap the number of messages to handle in one call at 10000. That way the pubIds can't loop around. It may be a trivial point depending on how unlikely it is to overflow 10000.

That way the pubIds can't loop around. It may be a trivial point depending on how unlikely it is to overflow 10000.
